text: Yesli bogoboyaznennost' - eto glavnoye, to ushcherb i uron budut doley togo, ch'i rechi ne sovpadayut s yego namereniyami, skryvayemymi v serdtse. Eti rechi mogut ponravit'sya tebe (o Mukhammad!) v blizhayshey zhizni, tem boleye, chto on prizyvayet Allakha v svideteli tomu, chem perepolneny yego dusha i serdtse. No etot tip cheloveka - samyy upornyy i besposhchadnyy v prepiratel'stve - tvoy nedrug
